glsa.title: mod_wsgi: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in mod_wsgi could lead to privilege escalation.

background.p: mod_wsgi is an Apache2 module for running Python WSGI applications.

description.p: mod_wsgi, when creating a daemon process group, does not properly handle dropping group privileges.

impact.p: Context-dependent attackers could escalate privileges due to the improper handling of group privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All mod_wsgi users should upgrade to the latest version:
